[`Plugin`](../Plugin) › [`loadData`](./loadData)

## Plugin.loadData() method

Load settings data from disk. Data is stored in `data.json` in the plugin folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
loadData(): Promise<any>;
```

**Returns:**

`Promise<any>`
